languages.text: {n}Дознаватель обводит взглядом каменоломню и коменданта.{/n} "Скверна проникла сюда давно и глубоко. Держите руки поближе к оружию, Лорд-капитан".
{n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель обводит взглядом каменоломню и коменданта.{/n} "Скверна проникла сюда давно и глубоко. Держите руки поближе к оружию, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted long ago and thoroughly. Keep your hands close to your weapons, Lord Captain."
{n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted long ago and thoroughly. Keep your hands close to your weapons, Lord Captain."
{n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted through long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

{n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert den Steinbruch und den Wächter.{/n} "Dieser Ort wurde vor langer Zeit durch und durch verdorben. Haltet Eure Waffen bereit, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator mustert den Steinbruch und den Wächter.{/n} "Dieser Ort wurde vor langer Zeit verdorben. Haltet Eure Waffen bereit, Lord Captain."

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur observe la carrière et le directeur.{/n} « Cet endroit est corrompu depuis longtemps. Gardez votre arme à portée de main, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur observe la carrière et le directeur.{/n} « Cet endroit est corrompu depuis longtemps. Gardez votre arme à portée de main, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希打量着这座采石场和典狱长。{/n}“这个地方很久以前就已经烂到根上了。准备好武器，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希打量着这座采石场和典狱长。{/n}“这个地方很久以前就已经腐化透了。准备好武器，舰长大人。”

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターが採石場と所長を調べる。{/n}「この場所は長いこと芯から腐敗している。いつでも武器を取れるようにしておくことだ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは採石場とワーデンを調べる。{/n}「この場所は長いこと腐敗している、いつでも武器を取れるようにしておくことだ、ロード・キャプテン」
{n}インテロゲイターが採石場と所長を調べる。{/n}「この場所は長いこと芯から腐敗している。いつでも武器を取れるようにしておくことだ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: {n}El interrogador escudriña al alcaide y la cantera.{/n} «La corrupción ha arraigado en este lugar hace tiempo. Mantenga sus armas al alcance de la mano, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador escudriña al alcaide y la cantera.{/n} «La corrupción se ha adueñado de este lugar hace tiempo. Mantenga sus armas al alcance de la mano, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, ocağı ve müdürü inceliyor.{/n} "Burası nicedir yozlaşmanın mabedi olmuş. Ellerin silahlarında olsun Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator surveys the quarry and the warden.{/n} "This place was corrupted to its core long ago. Keep your weapons close, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, ocağı ve müdürü inceliyor.{/n} "Burası nicedir yozlaşmanın mabedi olmuş. Ellerin silahlarında olsun Lord Kaptan."
